description:
The relaunch of "The X-Files" is still over six months away, but creator Chris Carter has just shared the first photo from the set and it's enough to drive fans wild.离《X档案》复活还有6个多月，不过制片人Chris Carter已经在ins上跟粉丝们晒出了第一张片场拍摄照。

While the Instagram photo doesn't show what's going on, the slate does give away some fun information. It's already been confirmed that some of the episodes will deal with the franchise's alien mythology, and the fact that Carter is testing UFOs is very exciting.不过这张Ins上的照片并没有显示具体是在干什么，不过上面的字给了大家一些提示。之前已经有消息确认复活版的《X档案》中会有关于外星人的剧情，而Cater晒出的板子上写着测试UFO似乎也是印证了这个说法。

Technology is much different now than it was when "The X-Files" first premiered in 1993. Will the look of UFOs in the series change with it?现在的科技和当年《X档案》所处的1993年相比已经有了巨大的进步。那么复活后的剧集中UFO们是不是也会有所变化呢？

"The X-Files" returns Sunday, June 24, 2016 on FOX.《X档案》将会在北京时间2016年6月25日回归FOX电视台。

title: 《X档案》即将回归 剧集已开拍
